edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.subsink

Class Sub

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.subsink.Entity
            • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.subsink.Sub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Sub
extends Entity
    Subs are the enemies in SubSink. They patrol the ocean and launch height charges to attack submarine destroyers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sub

        public Sub(double x,
           double y,
           double speed,
           double spawnFrequency)
        Construct a new Sub with the given initial parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - The initial x position in pixels
        y - The initial y position in pixels
        speed - The sub's horizontal speed. This should be a positive number; its sign will be chosen based on the x position such that the sub is moving onto the screen if it is offscreen.
        spawnFrequency - The average time between charge spawns

    • Method Detail

      • interact

        public void interact(Entity other)
        Interact with other entities. If the sub touches a depth charge, it damages the sub and explodes the charge.
        Overrides:
        interact in class Entity
        Parameters:
        other - The other entity with which to interact

      • damage

        public void damage()
        Deal a point of damage to the sub, destroying it.

      • update

        public void update(World world,
                   double time)
        Update the sub with respect to the world. Subs will move back and forth at a constant speed, bouncing off the walls of the game and spawning height charges at a random interval.
        Overrides:
        update in class Entity
        Parameters:
        world - The encompassing World
        time - The time since the last update in seconds

      • finalize

        public void finalize(World w)
        Register the death of the sub by granting one point to the player's score.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Entity
        Parameters:
        w - The encompassing World
